titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to provide a one-time abatement of interest on an underpayment or nonpayment of income tax for reasonable cause.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/7/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to provide, for reasonable cause, a one-time abatement of interest for individuals on underpayment or nonpayment of income tax.
